floater.name: build

check_box.label: Align
check_box.name: radio align
check_box.tool_tip: Aligns the edges of the selected prims along an axis, Keep SHIFT pressed to pack the prims till they are touching.

button.name: prev_child
button.tool_tip: Select the previous linked primitive or face (in texture selection mode).

button.name: next_child
button.tool_tip: Select the next linked primitive or face (in texture selection mode).

text.name: obj_count
text.tool_tip: This is the total number of selected objects. Click for detailed statistics.

text.name: prim_count
text.tool_tip: This is the total number of selected primitives. When the land impact is different than the number of primitives, it is presented between parenthesis after the latter. Click for detailed statistics.

floater.text: Drag to move, shift-drag to copy

panel.label: General
panel.name: General

check_box.name: share_with_group
check_box.label: Share with group
check_box.tool_tip: Allow all members of the set group to share and use your permissions for this object. You must Deed to enable role restrictions.

button.name: button deed
button.label: Deed...
button.tool_tip: Group shared objects can be deeded by you if you are a group officer. BEWARE: deeding an object to a group also means relinquishing its ownership to that group, i.e. you will not any more be considered as the owner of the object and owner-specific actions on it (such as taking the object back to your inventory, but not only) will become unavailable to you.

check_box.name: search_check
check_box.label: Show in search
check_box.tool_tip: Let people see this object in search results

text.name: next_owner_can
text.tool_tip: These are the permissions for the next person who will acquire this object (either by copying it, being it given by you, or buying it from you).

panel.text: Next owner will be able to:

icon.name: navmeshicon
icon.tool_tip: The current selection got navmesh/pathfinding attributes.

text.name: B:
text.tool_tip: These are the base permissions; the object can never be more permissive than this. V = Velocity (allow anyone to move), M = Modify, C = Copy, T = Transfer, E = Export.

text.name: O:
text.tool_tip: These are the owner permissions. V = Velocity (allow anyone to move), M = Modify, C = Copy, T = Transfer, E = Export.

text.name: G:
text.tool_tip: These are the group permissions (the group the object is set or deeded to is shown next to 'Group:' above). V = Velocity (allow anyone to move), M = Modify, C = Copy, T = Transfer.

text.name: E:
text.tool_tip: These are the permissions everyone else has on the object. V = Velocity (allow anyone to move), M = Modify, C = Copy, T = Transfer, E = Export.

text.name: N:
text.tool_tip: These are the permissions the next person to own the object will have. V = Velocity (allow anyone to move), M = Modify, C = Copy, T = Transfer.

text.name: F:
text.tool_tip: These are the permissions of the object as a whole (F = full), including all permissions of the object's contents. For example, a copyable object which has a no-copy item added to its contents becomes non-copyable as a whole because it's restricted by the no-copy content item. V = Velocity (allow anyone to move), M = Modify, C = Copy, T = Transfer.

panel.string: You can't modify this object across a region boundary.
You can't modify these objects across a region boundary.
Must select entire object to set permissions.

panel.label: Object
panel.name: Object
panel.text: Select only one primitive to edit parameters.

check_box.label: Paste shape
check_box.name: paste_shape
check_box.tool_tip: If checked and on 'Paste' action, causes the shape parameters to be set to the last copied ones.

check_box.label: Locked
check_box.name: checkbox locked
check_box.tool_tip: Prevents object from being moved or deleted. Frequently useful during building to avoid unintended edits.

check_box.label: Temporary
check_box.name: Temporary Checkbox Ctrl
check_box.tool_tip: Causes object to be deleted 1 minute after creation.

check_box.label: Phantom
check_box.name: Phantom Checkbox Ctrl
check_box.tool_tip: Causes object to not collide with other objects or avatars

check_box.label: Paste pos.
check_box.name: paste_position
check_box.tool_tip: If checked and on 'Paste' action, causes the position coordinates to be set to the last copied ones.

check_box.label: Paste size
check_box.name: paste_size
check_box.tool_tip: If checked and on 'Paste' action, causes the size dimensions to be set to the last copied ones.

check_box.label: Paste rot.
check_box.name: paste_rotation
check_box.tool_tip: If checked and on 'Paste' action, causes the rotation angles to be set to the last copied ones.

button.name: copy
button.label: Copy
button.tool_tip: Copy all the parameters of this primitive to the object clipboard.

button.name: paste
button.label: Paste
button.tool_tip: Paste the selected (with 'Paste ...' check boxes) parameters from the object clipboard.

check_box.label: Mirror
check_box.name: sculpt mirror control
check_box.tool_tip: Flips sculpted prim along the X axis.

check_box.label: Inside-out
check_box.name: sculpt invert control
check_box.tool_tip: Inverts the sculpted prims normals, making it appear inside-out.

panel.label: Features
panel.name: Features
panel.text: Select only one primitive to edit features.

check_box.label: Flexible path
check_box.name: Flexible1D Checkbox Ctrl
check_box.tool_tip: Allows object to flex about the Z axis. (Client-side only)

check_box.name: Physical Checkbox Ctrl
check_box.label: Physical
check_box.tool_tip: Allows object to be pushed and affected by gravity.

texture_picker.label: Projection
texture_picker.name: light texture control
texture_picker.tool_tip: Click to choose a projection image (its effect is only seen with deferred rendering enabled)

check_box.label: Animated mesh
check_box.name: AniMesh Checkbox Ctrl
check_box.tool_tip: Allows rigged mesh objects to be animated independently

button.name: reflection_probe
button.label: Reflection probe
button.tool_tip: Click to open the setup menu for an object used as a reflection probe.

color_swatch.name: colorswatch
color_swatch.tool_tip: Click to open the color picker

button.name: reset_material
button.label: Reset material
button.tool_tip: Clicking this button causes the removal of the material data for the selected faces.

radio_item.tool_tip: When this button is checked, you can edit the diffuse map (texture) and associated parameters for the selected face(s).
When this button is checked, you can edit the normal map (bumpiness) for the selected face(s).
When this button is checked, you can edit the specular map (shininess) and associated parameters for the selected face(s).
When this button is checked, you can edit the PBR (Physical Based Rendering) material and associated parameters for the selected face(s).

button.name: btn_edit_pbr
button.label: Edit this material
button.tool_tip: Click for live editing of the selected faces PBR material.

button.name: btn_local_pbr
button.label: Use local material
button.tool_tip: Click to load/apply a local preview of a PBR material (based on a local GLTF file).

button.name: btn_load_pbr
button.label: Load from inventory
button.tool_tip: Click to apply the PBR material from an inventory item.

button.name: btn_save_pbr
button.label: Save to inventory
button.tool_tip: Click to save the selected face PBR material into a material inventory item.

texture_picker.name: normal control
texture_picker.label: Normal map (bumpiness)
texture_picker.tool_tip: Click to choose a texture for the normal map (bumpiness).

texture_picker.name: specular control
texture_picker.label: Specular map (shininess)
texture_picker.tool_tip: Click to choose a texture for the specular map (shininess).

button.name: btn_align_map
button.label: Align map
button.tool_tip: Aligns the currently selected map on all selected faces of all selected objects to the last selected face repeats, offsets and rotation.

check_box.name: checkbox planar align
check_box.label: Align faces
check_box.tool_tip: Aligns textures on all selected faces to the last selected face. Requires Planar texture mapping.

button.name: button align
button.label: Align
button.tool_tip: NOTE: the media texture must first be loaded before it can be aligned.

check_box.tool_tip: Colour parcels according to their ownership
check_box.label: Show owners
check_box.name: checkbox show owners

floater.string: Click arrows to align objects, Shift-click to pack
Drag colored bands to rotate object
Click and drag to stretch selected side
Drag to move, shift-drag to copy
Click and hold to modify land
Click and drag to change view
Drag to move, Ctrl to lift, Ctrl-Shift to rotate
Click and drag to select land
